welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Springboro, the charming city known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and explore all the wonderful things this city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at James Cox Dayton International Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for domestic flights and includes amenities such as restaurants and shops.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is primarily used for international flights and includes amenities such as duty-free shops and currency exchange.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dayton-Wright Brothers Airport provides services for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dayton-Wright Brothers Airport caters to the needs of private jet owners and their guests.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Clinton Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Clinton Field Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for all passengers.
